meanings.definition: The quality of being enormous in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The enormousnesses of the mountain took our breath away.
meanings.sent2: The enormousnesses of the elephant amazed the children at the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The enormousnesses of the cake made it impossible to finish in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: The enormousnesses of the task ahead seemed insurmountable.
meanings.sent5: The enormousnesses of the ocean stretched out endlessly before us.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being enormous in magnitude.
meanings.sent1: The team was in awe of the enormousnesses of the challenge they faced.
meanings.sent2: The enormousnesses of the crowd at the concert was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The enormousnesses of the traffic jam made everyone late for work.
meanings.sent4: The enormousnesses of the problem required a creative solution.
meanings.sent5: The enormousnesses of the tree's trunk was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The vastness or immensity of something enormous.
meanings.sent1: The explorer marveled at the enormousnesses of the desert landscape.
meanings.sent2: The enormousnesses of the galaxy left the scientist in wonder.
meanings.sent3: The enormousnesses of the library's collection was a book lover's dream.
meanings.sent4: The enormousnesses of the universe is a topic that fascinates many.
meanings.sent5: The enormousnesses of the canyon was breathtaking to behold.
